content.label: Well, at least for me anyway. If you are a fan of ANY roguelite and the Hotline Miami series, then this is going to probably be your new favorite iOS game as well. This game is near perfect! My only setback is as one of the other reviewers stated, it will drain your full battery in less than an hour and make your phone overheat real bad IF you leave it on high display settings. THIS IS IMPORTANT! Anyone having either of these issues, go into the options menu>display settings>from here you can customize any of the settings, but I recommend to turn it onto LOW if you plan on playing this game for a long time like I do. This will cure ALL the overheating and battery drain issues, the only sacrifice with this that I have even noticed is a MARGINAL decrease in some of the real bright neon colors in the game. After 10 minutes of playing on this setting though, I didn't even notice it anymore, and have now been enjoying hours & hours of gameplay with no overheating and battery drain past normal battery consumption. And for the people that complained about not having a manual reload button, the tutorial tells you in the beginning you can turn the reload button on in the settings! I've had the reload button the whole time! After you turn the initial display settings down to low & turn the reload button on, this game plays amazing and I rarely ever rate games, especially rarely with a high rating and I can confidently say this is my game of the year! Btw, I am playing on an iPhone 6s Plus 128gb.

I was bummed to find Robotron 2084 is nowhere on the App Store. Neon Chrome though makes me significantly less bummed. Phenomenal twin stick shooter with a pretty neat premise and great soundtrack. Highly recommended.

title.label: Love me some tactical, twin-stick shooting

content.label:
The title of this review says it all. 

Get this great game!
Very polished game!
Like the replay ability of this game!
And I'm a stingy cynical cheapskate of a gamer. Buy it.

The game has a nice polish. The settings, the UI, the way when pausing it shows weapon/power/perks.
A big PLUS for me is all the upgrades you can do AND NOT LOSE THEM ONCE YOU DIE. 
Some games have you lose not only whatever perks you got BUT also the LEVEL YOU GOT UP TO. All around fun game.
BUT, con for not offering a male character. Not a huge thing since the characters are so small. Once you pick a person all the names are female though. The MAJORITY of the people who purchased this game is male. O well.
Feels good, looks good, sounds good. Safe to say it's a good game.

While I understand not making the iOS build as robust as the Steam version... it still kind of stinks. This is a fantastic game, and would have only been made better by including online modes. 
Don't let the fact that there's 'only' 25 levels turn you off... it's 25 levels for each playthrough... once you beat Overseer 1.0, you move on to replaying and beating Overseer 2.0... 3.0... ect... there is always more challenge to be had. The additional battery saving mode, and extra graphics options allows for smooth gameplay across quite a few devices, all the way back to the iPhone 5. So... if you're running iOS 8 or above, and interested in twin-stick roguelikes... you should definitely dig deeper into this one to see if it's something  you'd like. I know it'll never get deleted from my device.

Great game!

Recommend adding a mini map. 

Also, initial aiming with right virtual stick causes auto-shot to be shot in the direction opposite of which I was going for. This is a little annoying but not a big deal since ammo is limitless.
I played it first on my PS4 and this version is every bit as great! I absolutely love this game.
My sequel to space Marshall 2
I hated smash tv style games but this is pretty good
Exciting combat with destructible environments and a cool soundtrack, worth every cent.
How about 3D Touch support. And iCloud support! And more levels.  Great game.
Great game. Once you get used to the touch controls it's better than the console version. But I think on iOS Leap of Fate is the best cyber roguelite.

This top-down shooter is fun and well made. Gameplay gets harder as you finish each level - the levels repeat with more and tougher enemies each time. I'm a fan of the top-down genre so I'm a bit biased. This game will eat your battery for lunch so be prepared. The game offers a lower battery consumption option with the trade off of a few momentary slowdowns as other apps take control.  I've experienced a few glitches such as my player getting stuck in a corner but that was only once.  Loot tends to get stuck in beds so wait until they move away to shoot them.  My one major complaint is the cut scenes and voice overs get very, very tedious after playing many levels. Please provide a switch to disable them!

Amazing. You choose wether to go stealthily, or just blow everything and everyone to shards. Great graphics and an amazing soundtrack, this game kept me coming and coming back for more explosive action. Probably my favourite game on mobile.
Combination of first person shooter and puzzle/problem solving
Kind of a retro shooter game. It is pretty fun for a while. If this is your kind of game, then you are in luck!
Heir apparent to the dual joystick thrown.
Wow wow wow
Awesome game. My iPhone 7 plus starts to heat up quickly.
Fun.  Lots of replay-ability.  Lots of character development.  Great game.

title.label: Best five bucks I've spent on an iOS game

content.label:
It's a simple game: shoot and kill your way up through 25 or so levels until you're able to take out the final boss and replace the "Overseer." Gameplay is smooth and the graphics are great. You use dual-stick controls and the whole experience is dramatically improved if you use a game controller, such as the SteelSeries Nimbus.
After you've finished the first set of levels, the game starts over at a higher level of difficulty. It's addictive and fun.
I'm on my 3rd play-through and still loving it. Way more substance than almost any iPhone game I have played.
I was looking for something to fill the niche left by space marshals and Spartan assault. This filled it.

This game is one of the best top down shooters on the market. Insane replay value, good price point, no in-app purchases, good soundtrack, beautiful color scheme, and great progression system. This game is everything i could ask for in a mobile game. Perfect.
The only complaint I have is I wish there was an option to move the joystick. That's my only complaint and I never write reviews.
Great title no play to play, nice rogue like elements in a shooter
This is the type of action ive been searching all over the app store for. Best 5 bucks ive spent on here.
Dual control fast action arcade fun!
Incredible game.
Good.
Nothings better, played it on pc first, and this is even better!
Reminds me a lot of Space Marshals! Very well done.

This game has me hooked buy it now before price goes up but if it does buy it anyway it's that good. Update: okay this game is so great I can't stop playing. played thru 10 times and the levels get harder and better every time. I have over 1000 games this is easily in my top 5 games. Get this game.

title.label: Great game, but bad technical issues

content.label:
This looks and sounds great. They seem to really have done a good job with the gameplay and feel of this one. 

However, it runs terribly on my iPad mini 4 with the latest iOS. To my eyes it's 20 frames per second. Really choppy. I have to turn all settings to low to make it 30-40 fps. On my iPhone it runs like butter at 60 fps, but I want to play on the iPad. 

Fix this and this would be a 4 or 5 star game no problem.

Extremely solid game, what's also great is that they listened to the reviews and added a battery save option. This is a great roguelite if you're a fan of the genre. If you want something a little different than leap of fate (another great roguelite) this would be it. Support the developers! Not many premium games like this hit the App Store so when they do I always feel it's best to show your support to let the mobile gaming market grow into something more than freemium titles
I love the graphics, plot and action. I'm a fan of TDS games and this is one of my favorites.

This game is great
It has all the action you would want in a shooter and all the customization of an RPG 
At first the controls feel a little funky but after a few minutes of playing it feels smooth
Bottom line, you should get this game if you like twin stick shooter type games because it is easily one of the best on the app store
This is a great rouge like shooter, if you like games like Isaac or enter the gungeoun this is a great mobile substitute
Super awesome!!!!

Easy on the eyes, has solid, nonobtrusive RPG-ish mechanics, multisession progression. Appears to have robust replay value - perfect game for portables. 

Unlike something like Binding of Isaac, game is not too brutal (at least initially).

This is a great game by a great developer.  I have always enjoyed playing their games and Neon Chrome is no exception!  In fact it is raising the bar even further.  It is a great overhead, FPS that has just enough depth too make it immersive.  They have made the controls even smoother, if that were possible.  Great graphics and sound that is "just enough" to make I'd captivating, with out eating up your memory!  Considering $5 can be spent on a common fast food lunch, this game appears to have huge legs and even though I am just starting, looks to have lengthy gameplay.  The developer has always been great about updating and adding content.  After the $5 you initially pony up, there is nothing else to purchase.  You just have to keep getting better and can replay X forever until you do, if necessary?
  This is a solid 5* game IMO!  If you like their other efforts, you will love this one for sure!!
I dont normally play games on my iphone, but when i do, its neon chrome

title.label: Twin stick shooter with great atmosphere

content.label: Great fun so far.  Approachable and satisfying.  Toucharcade's review was spot on, 5/5
This game is fantastic
It's great!
This is one of the most enjoyable games I've played on iPhone in years. The visuals, sound, gameplay and overall feel of the game are brilliant. Highly recommended.
